com.github.mrm1st3r.connection.bluetooth

Class SimpleBluetoothConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.connection.ThreadedConnection
        • com.github.mrm1st3r.connection.bluetooth.SimpleBluetoothConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsynchronousConnection<java.lang.String>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SimpleBluetoothConnection
extends ThreadedConnection
implements AsynchronousConnection<java.lang.String>
    Implementation of AsynchronousConnection for use with Strings. Uses a BufferedReader for reading and a PrintWriter for writing.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Lukas Taake
